text:
I installed Lenya and clicked on the link on the left (Weblog), an error occurs:

java.net.URISyntaxException: Illegal character in path at index 16:
file:/C:/Program Files/Apache Group/Tomcat
5.0/webapps/lenya/lenya/pubs/default/config/ac/passwd/

I have Tomcat installed in the directory with space, thats the problem. But
spaces are often used in MS Windows. It should work... Please fix it.
creator: lzap@seznam.cz

text:
This is a well-known problem with Java-applications on Windows but it is 
outside the reach of the Lenya project or Apache.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
